main.name: Mo Kosol
main.bio: I'm a Fullstack Developer specialized in building websites and web apps with a big interest both front-end  and back-end.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.description: I'm a graduate of the University of Minnesota Full Stack Web Development Boot Camp  covering skills including HTML5 CSS Bootstrap JavaScript jQuery Node.js MYSQL MongoDB reactJs Express Git Heroku  and more.

education.school: VOLUNTEER OF AMERICA HIGH SCHOOL MINNEAPOLIS, MN

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Full stack web development responsible for end-to-end web app development and creative engineering Created a customer web form for TAAJ services clientele servicesBuilt an e-commerce web-app for TAAJ Services LLC.

skills.name: HTML
skills.description: HTML is the standard markup language for Web pages With HTML you can create your own Website HTML is easy to learn - You will enjoy it!

skills.name: CSS
skills.description: CSS is a language that describes the style of an HTML document CSS describes how HTML elements should be displayed.This tutorial will teach you CSS from basic to advanced.

skills.name: javaScript
skills.description: JavaScript is the programming language of HTML and the Web JavaScript is easy to learn.This tutorial will teach you JavaScript from basic to advanced.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template (link below in portfolio) which I used as a starting point for this personal site.

skills.name: mySql
skills.description: SQL is a standard language for storing, manipulating and retrieving data in databases.

skills.name: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: I have used many different database systems and am better educated and experienced with Relational Databases. However, for many applications, the ease of use of MongoDB better suits my needs and it is much more enjoyable to work with

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

projects.title: Clicky Game
projects.category: This app is a memory game with React. The idea of the game is to click on the cards without clicking on the same one twice until you click all 12 characters.

projects.title: Cart
projects.category: This app is simple react cart app

projects.title: Burger Restaurent!
projects.category: Overview A Node, Express, Handlebars, and MySQL burger app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat... and then devour them!

projects.title: Friend Finder!
projects.category: FriendFinder A fullstack match making application using the Express package for Node.js! This app uses Express to serve 2 static HTML files and 2 API routes to get and post data.
